value.title: StarCraft 2 - How Quickly Can SCARLETT Dispose Of Noobs? (Part 1) | Holdout Challenge
value.excerpt: We paid Scarlett to 1v1 noobs. The challenge: the noobs needed to stay in the match as long as possible. Scarlett unleashed her cheesy plays to stop the clock. value.title: This is why SC2 isn‚Äôt played on 50% hit points | PiG's Lab - StarCraft 2

value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
